org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction

Class SamResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction.SamResourceManager

  • public class SamResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Management of SAM resources:

    Provides methods fot the allocation/deallocation of SAM resources

    • Constructor Detail

      • SamResourceManager

        public SamResourceManager(org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.ReaderPlugin samReaderPlugin,
                          java.lang.String samReaderFilter)
                   throws org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException
        Instantiate a new SamResourceManager.

        The samReaderPlugin is used to retrieve the available SAM according to the provided filter.

        Setup a plugin observer if the reader plugin is observable.

        Parameters:
        samReaderPlugin - the plugin through which SAM readers are accessible
        samReaderFilter - the regular expression defining how to identify SAM readers among others.
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException - throw if an error occurs while getting the readers list.

    • Method Detail

      • allocateSamResource

        public SamResource allocateSamResource(SamResourceManager.AllocationMode allocationMode,
                                       SamIdentifier samIdentifier)
                                throws org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException
        Allocate a SAM resource from the specified SAM group.

        In the case where the allocation mode is BLOCKING, this method will wait until a SAM resource becomes free and then return the reference to the allocated resource. However, the BLOCKING mode will wait a maximum time defined in tenths of a second by MAX_BLOCKING_TIME.

        In the case where the allocation mode is NON_BLOCKING and no SAM resource is available, this method will return null.

        If the samGroup argument is null, the first available SAM resource will be selected and returned regardless of its group.

        Parameters:
        allocationMode - the blocking/non-blocking mode
        samIdentifier - the targeted SAM identifier
        Returns:
        a SAM resource
        Throws:
        org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.exception.KeypleReaderException - if a reader error occurs

      • freeSamResource

        public void freeSamResource(SamResource samResource)
        Free a previously allocated SAM resource.
        Parameters:
        samResource - the SAM resource reference to free
